## test

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(DiagrammeR)

grViz('
digraph G {
      size = "4,4";
      main [shape = box]; /* this is a comment */
      main -> parse [weight = 8];
      parse -> execute;
      main -> init [style = dotted];
      # main -> cleanup;
      execute -> { make_string; printf}
      init -> make_string;
      edge [color = red]; // so is this
      main -> printf;
      node [shape = box, style = filled, color = ".7 .3 1.0"];
      execute -> compare;
}')
```
